Html:
Hello There,

I am having difficulties trying to add a new user to Oxite. it seems to me from looking at the code, that a new user is created only when posting to the "Item" action in the "SiteController" (with a site that has an empty GUID as an ID!!!!). this action maps to the (Admin/Setup) URL. this URL however does not contain any form that has fields for adding new users.

Can someone please point me into how can I add a new user or rename the Admin user name?

Thanks All

Shady H. Sayed

Well from what I can see there is only one place to add a user and that is in the back end admin panel for lack of a better name for it....

You can change the admin name by a simple SQL query and update oxite_user table or correct the bug in the route for the find route for the user administration

and edit that user.

 

Keep in mind there is quite a lot in the back end that is not finished and or has bugs that you will have to fix.
